bibdata.title: Unapproved IEEE Draft Guide for High Voltage (>1000V) Circuit Breaker Instruction Manual Content
Unapproved IEEE Draft Guide for High Voltage (>1000V) Circuit Breaker Instruction Manual Content

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide identifies and summarizes circuit breaker manufacturer?s information that knowledgeable users will find useful for the receipt, installation, commissioning, operation and maintenance, and decommissioning of high-voltage (>1000V) circuit breakers. This guide recommends categories and an arrangement for the presentation of information in circuit breaker instruction manuals.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
